<h3 id="X38021">X(38021) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(2), X(4)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-3*(b+c)*a^3-(5*b^2-6*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2+3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+4*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38021) = X(1)+2*X(381) = X(1)+8*X(9955) = 5*X(1)+4*X(18480) = 4*X(1)+5*X(18492) = X(1)-10*X(18493) = 7*X(1)+2*X(18525) = 11*X(1)-2*X(18526) = X(1)+5*X(30308) = 17*X(1)-8*X(32900) = X(381)-4*X(9955) = 5*X(381)-2*X(18480) = 8*X(381)-5*X(18492) = X(381)+5*X(18493) = 7*X(381)-X(18525) = 11*X(381)+X(18526) = 2*X(381)-5*X(30308) = 17*X(381)+4*X(32900) = 10*X(9955)-X(18480) = 4*X(9955)+5*X(18493) = 8*X(9955)-5*X(30308) = 17*X(9955)+X(32900)</b>
<p>X(38021) lies on these lines: {1,381}, {2,40}, {3,28202}, {4,551}, {5,3656}, {9,11813}, {10,5071}, {11,11529}, {30,1699}, {36,28444}, {57,1727}, {84,10266}, {140,9589}, {165,5054}, {226,37704}, <p>
X(38021) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1699, 25055}, {3545, 5603}, {9812, 10304}, {10246, 14269}, {10283, 23046}<br>
X(38021) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (165, 5054), (3524, 19883), (3545, 3817), (3576, 25055), (3653, 38022), (5054, 11230), (5587, 3545), (10304, 10165), (15689, 17502), (19875, 5055), (25055, 5886), (26446, 15699), (38066, 38083), (38074, 38076)<br>
X(38021) = anticomplement of X(38068)<br>
X(38021) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 30308, 381), (2, 946, 31162), (2, 31162, 40), (2, 34632, 6684), (5, 3656, 3679), (5, 11522, 7982), (381, 9955, 30308), (946, 8227, 40), (962, 31423, 40), (1699, 5886, 3576), (3653, 5886, 38022), (3653, 38022, 25055), (3656, 3679, 7982), (3679, 11522, 3656), (3845, 5901, 3655), (4654, 10072, 3333), (4870, 11238, 1), (5818, 34631, 4669), (5886, 38034, 1699), (7988, 19875, 5055), (8227, 31162, 2), (9955, 18493, 1), (18393, 23708, 57)<br>
</p>
